attributes.action: not give warnings about OFSTED inspections at schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: OFSTED reports aren't at all accurate. Teachers rush round in advanced trying to make everything perfect. I don't think that's right because normally, all the pack lunches are crammed into one tiny hall, where we're not allowed chairs, but as soon as OFSTED turned up, suddenly chairs were out, the headteacher was out actually being half nice to students and in the end the OFSTED report was completely different to how it actually is at the green school.
